title: distribution solutions
extract: Definition of 'Distribution' Definition: Distribution means to spread the product throughout the marketplace such that a large number of people can buy it. ... Tracking the places where the product can be placed such that there is a maximum opportunity to buy it.
extract_html: Definition of 'Distribution' Definition: Distribution means to spread the product throughout the marketplace such that a large number of people can buy it. ... Tracking the places where the product can be placed such that there is a maximum opportunity to buy it.
